author: andyc
msg: 1) Fixed DOM bug caused by not propagating enough changes from the
recent XMLLocator API changes. The startDocument method wasn't
being called so the DOM document wasn't being constructed. So
it always threw a null pointer exception.

author: andyc
msg: Added XNI API overview and samples to documentation.
